name: Affirmation
description:
This is a gentle tale about people trying to regain something. And it is a tale of battle.
You choices will decide how their journey progresses and if they begin to change little by little...

_________________________________________________

Dev Notes:

Created as a first project using Fungus, for a part of my masters year project. (I only started learning how to use Unity in January. So please keep that in mind)

All of the imagery and music were sourced from royalty free websites such as freesound.org or http://pexels.com

As this is still in production, any and all feedback would be appreciated. :) 

I hope you liked it, if you did please let me know at @mslaurafagan on Twitter
